description.en: Decred aims to build a community-directed digital currency whose security, adaptability, and sustainability make it a superior long-term store of value. It is achieving this aim by building the world's first truly decentralized autonomous organization.

description.ko: 디크레드는 비트코인과 유사하지만 공동체 입력, 개방 통치, 지속 가능한 자금 조달과 개발에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 소규모 그룹이 공동체의 흐름을 지배하거나 배제할 수 없도록 하기 위해 "proof-of-work"와 "proof-of-stake" 채굴 시스템을 활용합니다. 통화의 무결성을 보장하고 사람들이 부정 거래를 하거나 자신의 동전을 만드는 것을 방지하기 위해, 블록체인이라고 알려진 거래 방법을 사용합니다.

status_updates.description:
Decred v1.7.0 "Based Bison" has now been released.
Everyone should upgrade their software at their earliest convenience to make sure they don't get left behind by the herd, and so we can begin voting as soon as possible.

https://github.com/decred/decred-binaries/releases/tag/v1.7.0

Read more about it here:

https://twitter.com/decredproject/status/1485643861342965767

Decred News Update - Brazil's future President uses Decred time-stamping, LTC markets on DCRDEX, dcrd v1.7.5 & more!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOWQ7sxr43E

Decred Journal – September 2022

Is here and it's huge! DCRDEX v0.5 public release now includes more wallet options and trading pairs including Litecoin LTC. Decred Lightning Network node count and capacity are also on the rise...

https://www.decredmagazine.com/decred-journal-september-2022/

Decred v1.7.5 is out, the release addresses a number of minor issues and updates Decrediton's bundled DCRDEX to the latest version for a better decentralized trading experience.

Get it now at https://decred.org/.

DCRDEX v0.5.3 has landed with @Litecoin support.

Users can now trade between $BTC and $LTC trustlessly via atomic swaps with no exchange fees, and while keeping custody of their coins the whole time.

No intermediary coins, no middlemen, true decentralization.

Coming soon™️: #Ethereum + #ERC-20s including stablecoins, #Dogecoin, #Zcash, #BitcoinCash.

Get it now at: https://dex.decred.org/

Decred Journal - August 2022 is out!

Decred is in full build mode but where to start! An overhaul of the decred.org website? Politeia new release? A massive upgrade for DCRDEX?

Or the many fixes and improvements...

Don't wonder, read up!

https://www.decredmagazine.com/decred-journal-august-2022/

Decred Monthly Recap - New Website, Dev Updates, Politeia 1.4.0, Articles + Interviews & More!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7IPj3rWmNY8
